name: iSeriesDbfit
tagline: DbFit is a database testing framework that supports easy test-driven development of your database code. iSeriesDbFit is tailored for IBM's implementation of DB2 on the iSeries.
body:
### DbFit Enabled for the iSeries.
DbFit is a framework that allows us to blend SQL verifications with our REST response verifications when testing with RestFixture.  We use RestFixture to issue the REST request and verify the XML response with XPATH expressions and very simple SQL queries.  

DbFit allows for more robust queries that are easier to write and to read.  Using this approach, we focus on the REST response using RestFixture, and we focus on verifying the client database using DbFit.

This project was forked from @benilovj.  His project can be found [here](http://benilovj.github.io/dbfit/).

## Downloading Binaries only
If you have no need for the source code, you can grab the binaries only [here](https://github.com/mikepatrick/dbfit/releases).    _**If you want to start using DbFit immediately, without building the project from source, this is the download you want.**_    The .zip and tar.gz download links above contain source only, and the project will need compiled before use.

Instructions for developers at CDS can be found [here](https://github.com/mikepatrick/dbfit/wiki).
